release.action: PDS-19 Defined RegistryPackage as an intrinsic object. Acts merely as a collection of registered objects through the use of Associations.
PDS-20 Added ExternalIdentifier support for registered objects.
PDS-8 Allow a set of Classifications to be associated with a given registry object
PDS-16 Configuration interface for registry service.
PDS-22 Include delete operation for Classifications delete.
PDS-1 Delete associations when a registry object is removed
PDS-17 Make associations based off their global identifier instead of lid vid.
PDS-3 Ability to page through all services.
PDS-7 Mapped Product to ExtrinsicObject to align better with information model for registry. Moved all interfaces that ended in product(s) to extrinsic(s).
Set the object type for all intrinsic objects.
PDS-7 Mapped Product to ExtrinsicObject to follow more from information model agnostic from the PDS model.
Refactored model classes from the service classes to allow for the core to be included as a jar dependency.
